# Named Colors Vista Graphics supports CSS named colors for easy color specification. ## Basic Colors `draw canvas [ pen red fill blue box 0 0 100 100 ]` ## Common Named Colors - **Primary**: red, blue, green, yellow, orange, purple - **Neutral**: black, white, gray, grey - **Status**: success, warning, error, info ## Extended Colors `draw canvas [ fill tomato circle 100 100 50 fill steelblue circle 200 100 50 ]` ## See Also - [Color Overview](/wiki/graphics/colors/color-overview/) - Color introduction - [RGB & RGBA](/wiki/graphics/colors/rgb-rgba/) - RGB color reference
